website_summaries.verdict: Handy and sturdy to have in all places to prevent mess.
pros: Discreet and versatile, these bags work well whether dealing with the effects of motion sickness or long term illness that causes nausea
Small enough to pack in one's pocket.Comfortable enough for kids to use themselves
cons: Works best when it can be disposed of quickly

customer_reviews.title: These bags work great. We can keep them in the car
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bags as my son has cancer and with chemo he needs something close by. These bags work great. We can keep them in the car, in my purse, a pocket of his jacket. They have not failed once. I bring tie enclosures with me to close the bag after usage. Well worth the price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Never leave home without them..!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect. My family has used them in the car and while watching TV. Just out of nowhere, my husband got really sick. I grabbed one of the bags just in time for him to use. He literally filled it to the top!! I never leave home without a couple now.
customer_reviews.author: Rhelda Doke

customer_reviews.title: Good to the last drop!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, when it's your turn to be DD and your friends decide they have to go shot for shot to prove how bad ass they are...these babies will save the interior of any vehicle you drive. The sturdy design so far is puncture proof. Good for the friends that insist on wearing spikes for nails. I would recommend a rubber band feature. So you can lash it to their heads. It would make it a much safer driving experience.
customer_reviews.author: JJ McGee

customer_reviews.title: They break!!
customer_reviews.text: Received these on Saturday. Was really excited bc they had a 48 pack for the same price as the 45 pack I bought previously. (Not a huge savings, but I am pregnant with hyper emesis gravidarum and go through A LOT of emesis bags) since Saturday, I have had 2 bags break!! When I go to twist the bag to close, the bag slips out of the white plastic ring and onto my floor!! Disgusting and extremely frustrating to have to clean up vomit on my floor after being exhausted from throwing up!! Do not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Bag detaches from circular opening A big mess
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!!! Blue bag detaches from circular opening. Purchase from a different vendor. My kid has GP so we carry vomit bags everywhere. These are trash waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: belinda bly

customer_reviews.title: Here's hoping you don't need them, but having them on hand is a great idea!!
customer_reviews.text: Having had to use one of these recently after being in the very front row at the movie theater (hello, motion sickness), I decided to buy these both to replace the one in my friend's car and to have them on hand. They seem very well made and I can tell you first hand they are great to have when you need them. As opposed to most products, I am happy to say that I have in fact NOT had to use them yet, and that is a good thing!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: A great solution to an unattractive problem
customer_reviews.text: My wife has stomach ulcers and has had issues for quite some time. After tiring of the frequency in which I had to pull off the road or using recycled plastic grocery bags with occasional holes in them, I turned to these 'barf bags'. She keeps a couple in each of our vehicles and in her purse. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Donald E Neale Jr

customer_reviews.title: Parents...BUY NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how often you have had to clean up vomit from your car or home, but with a house full of toddlers it seems like an everyday occurrence at my home. Then I remembered an ER visit where one of my kids was given one of these blue bags. I went on Amazon, and have been THRILLED with my purchase! If you have kids...BUY NOW!!! No more cleaning out a smelly ShopVac for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: must have for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant. And I bought these before long travel (plane + car). Those vomit bags saved me all the time! It's very quick to grab one of those, and the opening is nice and wide. Be careful with the white ring though - it does come apart easily, but it wasn't a problem for me because I was holding it by the blue plastic anyway.
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so useful! Motion sickness, cars, boats, pregnancy sickness, etc. I bought them to keep them handy for my mother during chemotherapy. I also keep them behind the seats of my car when I am ridesharing guests, in case they have had too much to drink or are feeling motion sickness. For the price, these are so portable and easy to keep ready compared to a basin.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Auclair

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones in the hospital
customer_reviews.text: I first used this type of emesis bag in the hospital. It was easy to use, sturdy and hygenic vs a plastic emesis pan. I wanted to have some at home, so od course I looked on Amazon. I found this seller offered the same product as the hospital. The seller delivered quickly as well. Very satisfied and will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Harmonygirl

customer_reviews.title: Our kids love these bags when they are sick and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, my family loves these things. We saw a similar bag on a visit to the ER and took one home with us. We decided to leave it in the van for emergencies because my kids always puke in the van. Well, it didn’t take long before our 4 year old tells us she’s going to puke in the van and BAM! Grabbed the bag, she held it herself and NO MESS! It’s a lot less scary to hold a little blue bag everywhere you go that stay in the bathroom or keep your head over a bucket. Our kids love these bags when they are sick and I love them because it’s no mess! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good use
customer_reviews.text: When you have three sick kids at home...you can imaging the frequency of vomiting, this Emerson’s bag is definitely helping mama with the eliminating the floor clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent...
customer_reviews.text: I have a degenerative illness and one of the unfortunate symptoms is severe nausea. During each of my hospitalizations, then nurses made sure to keep my room stocked with collapsible "vomit bags." Thankfully, my hospital stays are less frequent but the waves of nausea persist. My husband found these similar bags here on Amazon and they are truly life savers. Each of our vehicles, rooms and home office have stashes of bags. I also carry one in my purse and walker. I HIGHLY recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: thick bags
customer_reviews.text: My child recently suffered a concussion that had her throwing up at the hospital. I liked the convenience of the emesis bags there, so I looked online for some for the house. These bags are thicker than the ones provided at the hospital which makes us feel more confident that they won't break (not that we have had any of any brand break just that these feel very sturdy). We will likely continue to purchase due to convenience.
customer_reviews.author: JS & RS

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love not having to hunch over a toilet bowl, and being able to tuck them in my purse and in the car if the need arises from morning sickness. So much better being able to puke from the comfort of the sofa versus the cold tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great barf bags
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bags. We have little kids, so our family gets Norovirus at least once a year. They are super helpful to keep around for when we need them. I’m going to stash a few in the car for emergencies as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sam7743

customer_reviews.title: These bags are strong, leak proof and hold a ton!  They are EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are excellent. My husband had a stroke and had had a ton of vomiting. These bags have never let me down. They contain the entire mess. They are very strong. I have since ordered another package of 48 as the first batch of bags were so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: A Necessity!
customer_reviews.text: As a Parent this is a must have! We always keep 2 around when traveling, in our vehicle and around our home. Keeps mess to minimal & clean-up is simple. A Must have for Families! Strong bag, won't year or create a bigger Mess!
customer_reviews.author: IamT1

customer_reviews.title: Emesis bags
customer_reviews.text: I have medical problems and these bags come in handy while traveling or just at home. They hold quite a bit and have never leaked. I carry one in my purse and in my car also.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Yates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for carsick people
customer_reviews.text: I purchases these bags Because they seemed to fit what we need them for. My daughter gets super carsick and to have something like these on hand for our vehicles is perfect. The bag is sturdy and so is the “rim” so she won’t miss using s regular paper/plastic bag. They’re easily stored in our compartments in our vehicles and the price is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dddcrdcdcxdxedeexexexexe,ssesesswwsswswswzsawzqzq

customer_reviews.title: Great barf bags
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had any barf in one of these yet, but they are in the car waiting for the next car sick individual. They are very thick and well made, just like the ones from the ER. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are wonderful. Leak proof and helps with messes. I have a dispute that vomits quite often and it nice being able to have these bags and not have to clean up vomit
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Arthur

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very handy product and well made. My son has an over reactive gag reflex and we need to always carry plastic bags, those are so much better since they fold well, can be closed securely and don’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: KatieA

customer_reviews.title: LEAKING!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband who is a cancer patient. Several of them leaked out the bottom! What a mess. Purchase another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lunker

customer_reviews.title: Hope you don’t need these but they work great when needed
customer_reviews.text: My grandma who lives with me has advanced lung cancer and after radiation she had a hard time of it and was vomiting often, these bags are great. No more trying to run to the bathroom when she’s shakey on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Life (and carpet!) Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Train your children young! Forget buckets that splash and spill. Grocery bags with a whole in the bottom you missed. These little blue bags carry their weight in gold at our house. Stash some in every bathroom, bedroom and car. Will never go without again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how we lived without these! Perfect for keeping in the car or close by when nauseated.
customer_reviews.author: susan r gregg

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Great for the days grandkids are sick and I have them while parents work. Better than a trash can or rinsing buckets. No muss no mess
customer_reviews.author: Carol Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Valuable accessory for the car when passengers are plagued with motion sickness!
customer_reviews.text: My young granddaughters (3 & 6) always get car sick. I mean always! These bags are the perfect size for them, they have a plastic ring opening, yet they're compact and easy for the girls to handle. We keep a couple in the pockets of the seats. When needed my daughter can easily hand them to the girls and the nasty mess is averted.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: These Emesis Bags were a life saver not long after I got them. I was very sick for several days, and they kept me from having to run to the bathroom several times during that time. I have been telling others about them. I will NEVER be without them again. I even have some in our vehicle just incase.
customer_reviews.author: East Texas Lady

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and disposable
customer_reviews.text: I keep stocked up on these because they are so convenient and useful when not feeling well. So much better than having to keep a big container with you, you can keep them in your purse, car, etc. for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad to help with Chemotherapy sickness. They're very handy to have in each room and in the car. They cold for easy storage and hold waste very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A family member gets sick in the car and it's easy to store in the glove box for those occasions. Also we found it pretty sturdy compared to a previous brand we had. Will buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: No need to carry a bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my great aunt and it working out perfectly fine for her.
customer_reviews.author: Gem.. P

customer_reviews.title: Great barf bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my child who get car sick Great product to always have i hand for those just Incase moments.
customer_reviews.author: piratemom

customer_reviews.title: They are clean and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I have a granddaughter who has bad motion sickness in a car. These are the best. At 3 1/2 years of age she knows when she is going to vomit and tells her Mother. These are the greatest. No mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect and are easy to store carry and tie after they are used.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Collins

customer_reviews.title: They are leakproof and deep.
customer_reviews.text: These are very helpful for us because of the of reflux problem my husband has. Also handy to carry in a car if one of your children gets sick.
customer_reviews.author: lannbarkley

customer_reviews.title: Truly a must have
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs these in the house and car. I have given them to so many people and they all order more. Truly a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use them yet!
customer_reviews.text: The product appears to be very well made and able to handle the 'flow' Very nice round mouthpiece, gives the patient a firm surface. No flimsy bag in case the patient misses the mark. Can't say I am looking forward to using them, but when the need arises, we will be ready!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed and expected.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter get car sick. She is 5 years old and knows how to use it. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alan K Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great puke bag
customer_reviews.text: They have never leaked and have ordered/used over 100. If you have chronic illness or morning sickness they fit perfect in your purse and twist shut until you can find a trash to dispose of it. Also have ounce measurements on the side of you like tracking vomit output.
customer_reviews.author: Neko

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be glad you have it when you need it
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Grateful to have in the car but hope we don’t need to ... but we always seem to need it. Makes for easy clean up and I don’t need to improvise for something (that doesn’t always work) last second. Also easy to use for the kids (even by themselves) and the other kids don’t have to see it in the blue bag so they don’t get sick themselves
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: A must have for kids who get car sick
customer_reviews.text: We keep these stashed in the car. Easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: KReece

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandma was in the hospital and she was using this barf bags. I found this post and I thought, well let's try it out maybe could be similar. But actually when they arrived (in only 2 days by the way) they are exactly like the ones that my grandma was using while she was at the hospital. Plus the why for this price is a really good deal. It was more than I expected. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Perez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have for my 21 birthday party and tested out with my friend if its leak proof/ how sturdy it is and it is super sturdy! Held water well! I also stretched out the plastic and even then it didnt rip unless i pulled with all my might signifying that the bag is more than suitable to hold vomit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Sure wish I had these 50 years ago. should be in every medicine cabinet....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones in the hospital
customer_reviews.text: Needed it for my wife during her pregnancy. It's super convenient. Just keep a couple lying around in the car or wherever. No more messes to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold in the hand
customer_reviews.text: We use it the VA Medical Center. It always works, easy for the Patients a hold in their hands. That’s why I knew the product would work for our Uber business
customer_reviews.author: zara dozier

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 kids so when one of them gets sick it’s only a matter of time before the rest of them do. These bags save me so much time from washing out bowls and scrubbing carpet and changing sheets. These catch everything then I throw them away!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jared stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for a road trip have not used them yet. Seem to be a good quality and was shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is difficult to find these in stores
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I expected and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Great service and product
customer_reviews.text: The bags were just what I needed and were delivered timely. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty plastic material
customer_reviews.text: I have found that these bags are of a much heavier material than previous ones purchased and being a ride share service driver it's nice know that the bag isn't going to rip or give out while in the vehicle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for car trips
customer_reviews.text: having little ones means lots of unexpected outcomes. having these on hand means I'm prepared for car trip and motion sickness!
customer_reviews.author: mommyinaustin

customer_reviews.title: Got kids??
customer_reviews.text: Get carsick? Stomach bug with kids that won’t sit still by a trash can? These will help
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbubbles

customer_reviews.title: Useful....
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my pregnant wife. Although hardly used, we both agree that this is good to keep around, especially when traveling in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have if you have children. My daughter gets car sick so they are small and easy to take along on trips. Love the face you can close them up as well. They also work great when someone is sick at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spectrum Parent
customer_reviews.text: My son has Autism and he has severe anxiety. He starts throwing up when his anxiety hits, with no warning to me! These bags have saved me from having to have my car detailed every few weeks!! He knows what they’re for and where to find them in the car when he needs them!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are so great to have on hand! They make clean up so much easier! I will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie G

customer_reviews.title: These work as good as the ones you get from the hospital (which ...
customer_reviews.text: These work as good as the ones you get from the hospital (which are too expensive) these Emesis bags are amazing and work well for my needs. I get car sick very easy and they are perfect! I recommend theses for sure A++++¥
customer_reviews.author: nickelbackgurl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome medical equipment!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. My son has a medical condition that results in frequent vomiting, with minimal warning, and these have saved my car, his car seat and his clothes countless times. They are thick and sturdy and keep the smell associated with vomiting to a minimum. Absolute lifesavers!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great twist and dispose feature
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for my husband who is a cancer patient going through chemo. We leave them all around the house and carry them where ever we go. The twist and dispose feature works really well.
customer_reviews.author: rosalie mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Just like the kind they use in hospitals
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous when you have small children who are ill. These are disposable and a lot more sanitary than having to use other things. Because they are small, I have put one in the glove box of my car, just in case. Would definitely recommend and have already purchased more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver if you get sick a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact they are so handy. I keep them everywhere from the bathroom to the livingroom and even the cars. They are perfect if you get sick a lot like me due to chemo.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Got these when wife is pregnant. For Car and home. We only use them for emergency. They work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Great for putting in all cars when sickness during pregnancy is an issue. easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: joni

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered if you are nauseous, and need something to catch the vomit!
customer_reviews.author: Gary J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I have not had to use the bags yet. They look like they will be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Faye P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and clean
customer_reviews.text: My mother's aunt used these while she was in hospice with cancer. She preferred these emesis bags over others. The cap stayed secure, they were leak proof, smell free, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jemry Senneff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use them for my grandkids who never seem to make it to the bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Work as designed
customer_reviews.text: These are great and work as designed. Make clean up from the kids super easy.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised! Awesome product, thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, got here fast and served it's purpose perfectly! Thank you again!

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this product is to use! I am in the throws of morning sickness in my first pregnancy and I love how these bags make me feel comfortable driving to work. After an unfortunate incident where I threw up all over in the car, I knew I needed something. This product works great, it fully covers your mouth allowing you to throw up without making a mess. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: sfree

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Easy to use and very well constructed.

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Compact
customer_reviews.text: I’m a late night Uber/Lyft driver - and as I’m sure you’re all aware these bags can be a life saver. They hold 1L and I can fit 6 in my glove compartment. If someone walks into my car feeling like they have an upset stomach, I’ll hand them two of these just in case (or generally Ill hand them to their friend). Well designed product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Synor

customer_reviews.title: Morning Sickness Help
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our relative who is experiencing morning sickness and it has helped tremendously when she is out socially or out walking with her toddler in their neighborhood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our elementary school during flu season. Need I explain more?

customer_reviews.title: These bags are easy to use store and clean up
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on chemo and is real sick. These bags are easy to use store and clean up. Life saver!

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is great, and the quality of the product appears to be good too. I have not used any yet but they look like they are made just like the other higher priced emesis bags we purchased before.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Ordered them for my wife whose pregnant and needed bags on the go in case she got sick. They seal shut after use and can be thrown in the trash without any odor.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones you get in the hospital
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones you get in the hospital. They would get 5 stars except if the bag gets to full it can fall off the white ring.
